name: Stuffed. 2.0 - Limited Edition
description:
Whether you're stuffing the turkey or stuffing your face, this is the perfect glittery topcoat to celebrate Fall and everything you're thankful for. A mix of matte and metallic glitters in brown, lime, white, red, yellow, orange, garnet, and more - it's a cornucopia of warm-toned glitters! If the pilgrims wore polish, they would've jumped on this one! This polish is a remixed version of last year's Stuffed.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Z for Zombies 2.0 - Limited Edition
description:
No one said a reanimated corpse was pretty... True to life, this sickly green is speckled with blood red shreds, brain-pink particles, and green holographic hexes. For those nights of the living dead, you'll fit right in.. This polish is a reformulation of 2012's Z for Zombies.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Danse Macabre 2.0 - Limited Edition
description:
Danse Macabre 2.0 is a revamped version of last year's "Danse Macabre." A ghoulish mix of black glitters (including bars) with neon glitter in green, orange, and pink, the neon glitters are also black light reactive! This polish will layer over a variety of frightening colors, adding a fun way to light the night this Halloween, for all your morbid curiosities. 

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Laughing in the Dark
description:
It’s the most fun in the park when you’re laughing in the dark… Don’t be scared while wearing this purple jelly with neon green, yellow, red, and purple glitters, inspired by Zeebo the cigar-smoking clown. 

Nail swatches are 3 coats. First swatch courtesy of Ida Nails It: http://idanailsit.blogspot.com/2013/09/happy-hands-are-you-afraid-of-dark.html

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Super Specs
description:
Use this glitter topcoat to see into another dimension (but don’t say I didn’t warn you!) This polish is packed with holographic silver glitter, iridescent glitter, purple shimmer, and green flecks. 

Swatches show one coat over base color. First swatch is courtesy of Accio Lacquer: http://acciolacquer.com/swatches/happy-hands-are-you-afraid-of-the-dark/

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: The Midnight Society
description:
Submitted for your approval, this is a glow-in-the-dark blue jelly (and it also glows blue) with micro iridescent glitters. I declare this meeting of the Midnight Society closed. 

Nail swatches are 3 coats. First swatch courtesy of Ida Nails It: http://idanailsit.blogspot.com/2013/09/happy-hands-are-you-afraid-of-dark.html

Last photo is courtesy of Accio Lacquer: http://acciolacquer.com/swatches/happy-hands-are-you-afraid-of-the-dark/

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: The Tale of the Dark Music
description:
Won’t you come play with me? This is a black jelly filled with microglitters in red, fuchsia, purple, and blue, and reminiscent of something evil lurking behind that cellar door.

Nail swatches are 3 coats (4 coats for the swatch from Accio Lacquer). First swatch is courtesy of Accio Lacquer: http://acciolacquer.com/swatches/happy-hands-are-you-afraid-of-the-dark/

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Everything's Coming Up Milhouse
description:
If you don't already have a nerdy best friend to back up all of your mischievous pranks, maybe this polish will help! A bright medium-blue jelly filled with yellow, orange-red, plum, and blue glitters.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Finger swatch is 3 coats with topcoat.
Swatch wheel shows one coat, two coats, 3 coats.

name: Stupid Flanders
description:
Stupid Flanders: An evergreen polish with brown, bright yellow, gray, and plum glitters inspired by everyone's favorite neighborino! (Feels like you're wearing nothing at all.. nothing at all.. nothing at all...)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Finger swatch is 3 coats with topcoat.
Swatch wheel shows one coat, two coats, 3 coats.

name: Worst. Polish. Ever.
description:
Worst. Polish. Ever.: Why you little...! This is whirlwind of yellow, blue, brown, red, orange, and green in a glitter topcoat to bring your favorite cartoon family to your nails!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Finger swatch is 1 coat over purple, with topcoat.
Swatch wheel shows one coat over each.

name: Krustofsky
description:
Krustofsky: Hey hey hey! An ode to the disfunctional TV clown, this is a white jelly filled with yellow, blue, purple, orange, red, and green glitters.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Finger swatch is 3 coats with topcoat.
Swatch wheel shows one coat, two coats, 3 coats.

name: Sector 7-G
description:
Sector 7G: A medium gray jelly with (not-quite glowing) neon green hexes, squares, and iridescent lime glitters. Even for the simplest safety inspector from Sector 7-G, this polish is nucular!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Finger swatch is 3 coats with topcoat.
Swatch wheel shows one coat, two coats, 3 coats.

name: Sandcastles in the Sand
description:
Inspired by my favorite song by Robin Sparkles, this polish is a sandy-hued jelly with gold and ocean blue holo glitters to capture the beauty of the glistening sand and water of the beach.

Swatch wheel shows 1 coat, 2 coats, 3 coats. Nail swatch is 3 coats, courtesy of Samarium's Swatches.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Tropical Storm
description:
Sometimes your beach vacation doesn’t go according to plan thanks to a pesky Tropical Storm. Not as dangerous as a hurricane, but just as annoying! A dusty turquoise jelly with coral, gold, and blue glitters to show just how messy - but beautiful – Mother Nature can be.

Swatch wheel shows 1 coat, 2 coats, 3 coats. Nail swatch is 3 coats, courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Cherry Cola
description:
A perfect summertime refreshment, Cherry Cola will cool you off with it’s delicious jelly base and cherry red glitter.

Swatch wheel shows 1 coat, 2 coats, 3 coats. Nail swatch is 4 coats, courtesy of Samarium's Swatches.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Beachy Keen
description:
The namesake of this collection embodies hot summer afternoons with glitters in hot coral, fuchsia, pink, gold, and turquoise. A glitter topcoat that looks great over your summer pedi!

Swatch wheel shows 1 coat over each. Nail swatch is 1 coat over Illamasqua Jo'Mina, courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Tricks Are Something A Whore Does For Money.. Or Candy
description:
This is no illusion! A protestacular mix of silver, holographic green, and gold glitters including some truly magical holo stars! This polish is part of the I've Made a Huge Mistake! Collection re-release.

Nail swatch shows 1 coat courtesy of Samarium's Swatches. Nail wheel is one coat over each.

**this polish has been reformulated. It now contains more sizes of glitter for better variety and application.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Illusions, Michael
description:
Illusions, Michael: Put away your Sword of Destiny and put on this magical polish! Illusions, Michael contains a mix of red, gold, orange, and holographic stars. This polish is part of the I've Made a Huge Mistake! Collection re-release.

Nail wheel is one coat over each. Nail swatches courtesy of Ida Nails It and Lavish Layerings, and both are one coat over a base color.

**this polish has been reformulated. It now contains more sizes of glitter for better variety and application.


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: For British Eyes Only
description:
Only a Mr. F wouldn’t love this polish (just kidding)! A teal jelly with satin & holographic teal glitter, it truly is love, indubitably. This polish is part of the I've Made A Huge Mistake! Collection re-release.

Nail swatch shows 4 coats, courtesy of Samarium's Swatches. Nail wheel is 1, 2, 3 coats.

**this polish has been reformulated. It now contains less small glitters and a more opaque base for better application and opacity.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: I Just Blue Myself
description:
Now you can blue yourself, too! Multiple sizes, shapes, and finishes of blue glitter make this a perfect glittery topcoat to finish yourself off! This polish is part of the I've Made a Huge Mistake! Collection re-release.

Nail swatch shows 2 coats over China Glaze Hanging in the Balance, courtesy of Samarium's Swatches. Nail wheel is one coat over each.

**this polish has been reformulated. It now contains more size and color variety of glitter, for better application and depth.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Mayonegg
description:
There’s nothing too disgusting about this milky white polish with yolk-y yellow glitter! This polish is part of the I've Made a Huge Mistake! Collection reformulated release. 

Nail swatch shows 3 coats, courtesy of Samarium's Swatches. Nail wheel is 1, 2, 3 coats.

**this polish has been reformulated. It now contains no shimmer, and a different shade of yellow glitter. Application is much easier.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each polish is 15mL / .5 fl oz, in square bottles.

All polishes are handmade in small batches. They each have 2 zinc-free, stainless steel ballz to help mix things up, though minimal shaking is required as these polishes are well suspended.

name: Banana Stand
description:
A yummy yellow jelly crème with chocolate-brown glitter and of course, there’s always green glitter in Banana Stand!

Nail swatch is 3 coats, courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.

All polishes are 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: Motherboy
description:
There’s nothing like a mother & son wearing matching outfits, and now they can match their nail polish too!

This is a mix of pastel satin glitters in green, aqua, baby blue(th), pink, and lavender.

Nail wheel shows 1 coat over each. 
Nail swatch is 1 coat over Zoya Jolene, courtesy of Samarium's Swatches.

All polishes are in 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: Kitten Mittens - Happy Revolution
description:
Is your cat making too much noise all the time?... Think there's no answer? You're so stupid! There is! Kitten Mittens. An adorable white jelly with white, black, bubblegum, and baby blue glitters.

Wheel swatch shows 1, 2, 3 coats. Nail swatch is 3 coats courtesy of Samarium's Swatches.

This polish is part if the Project Badass collection, created by Happy Revolution (a collaboration between Polish Revolution and Happy Hands Nail Polish).

name: Nightcrawlers - Happy Revolution
description:
What is Nightcrawlers? Why, it's a game where you crawl around in the night like worms.. and this polish is perfect for the occasion, without ruining it with blankets. This is a wine-colored jelly with matte gray, silver, gunmetal, and burgundy glitters and red micro glitter.

Wheel swatch shows 1, 2, 3 coats. Nail swatch is 3 coats courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.

This polish is part if the Project Badass collection, created by Happy Revolution (a collaboration between Polish Revolution and Happy Hands Nail Polish).

name: The Nightman Cometh - Happy Revolution
description:
Nightman, sneaky and mean; spider inside my dreams, I think I love you. You too can have sexy hands like Nightman, with this polish! A glitter topcoat with black, lime, gold, and white glitter.

Wheel swatch shows 1 coat over each. Nail swatch is 1 coat courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.

This polish is part if the Project Badass collection, created by Happy Revolution (a collaboration between Polish Revolution and Happy Hands Nail Polish).

name: Nursery Rhymes
description:
Nursery Rhymes is a pastel yellow creme-jelly with sweet pastel stars in aqua, lavender, and bubblegum.

Swatch wheel shows 1, 2, 3 coats.
Nail swatch is 4 thin coats, courtesy of Samarium's Swatches.

All polishes are in 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: B for Butterflies
description:
B for Butterflies is a jade creme-jelly with a garden of butterflies and flowers and smaller glitters, in pinks, lavender, and aqua.

Swatch wheel shows 1, 2, 3 coats.
Nail swatch shows 3 thin coats, courtesy of Samarium's Swatches.

All polishes are in 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: Sweet Dreams
description:
Sweet Dreams is a dreamy aqua blue jelly with pastel green, pink, aqua and holographic purple glitters.

Nail wheel shows 1, 2, and 3 coats. 
Nail swatch shows 3 coats, courtesy of Samarium's Swatches.

All polishes are in 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: The Worst Is Over
description:
"Whatever you need to make you feel, like you've been the one behind the wheel.. The sunrise is just over that hill, the worst is over." 

An almost-dusty purple creme-jelly formula with orange, red, pink, purple and turquoise glitters. 

Nail wheel shows 1 coat, 2 coats, 3 coats.
Macro shot is courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.
Nail swatch is 3 thin coats, and courtesy of Samarium's Swatches.

All polishes are in 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: Metal Heart
description:
"You're not hiding; metal heart, you're not worth a thing." 

This is a raspberry jelly with hot pink, purple, and black glitters with glowing purple iridescent glitters. 

Nail wheel shows 1 coat, 2 coats, 3 coats, and 1 coat over China Glaze Traffic Jam.
Macro shot is courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.
Nail swatch is 3 coats, and courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.

All polishes are in 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: For You, My Love...
description:
A soft nude-pink jelly with various sizes of red glitter (in satin and holographic) with short red bar glitter as well, and a beautiful fine red shimmer. 

Nail wheel shows 1 coat over OPI My Very First Knockwurst, 3 coats, 2 coats, 1 coat.
Macro shot is courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.
Nail swatch is 3 coats, and courtesy of Samarium's Swatches.

All polishes are in 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: Am I Not Yours?
description:
A teal-green jelly filled with sapphire, lime, green, teal, and chartreuse glitters (mostly holographic and a few satin squares). 

Nail wheel shows 1 coat, 2 coats, 3 coats, 1 coat over AA Hunter, 1 coat over OPI Ski Teal We Drop.
Macro shot is courtesy of Chalkboard Nails. 
Nail swatch is 3 coats, courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.

All polishes are in 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: Flowers on the Highway
description:
This polish is an eclectic mix of wildflower-inspired hexes including pinks, white, lavender, green, yellow and small black glitters. The perfect glitter topcoat for Summer! 

Swatches show 1 coat over each.
Nail swatch courtesy of Let Them Have Polish.

All polishes are in 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: Lady Goodman
description:
I dig music. 

A soft lavender jelly with pink, gold, and purple glitter. Nail swatch shows 2 coats.

Nail wheel shows 1 coat over AA L'Esprit, 3 coats, 2 coats, 1 coat.
Nail swatch shows 3 coats, courtesy of Samarium's Swatches.

All polishes are in 15mL square bottles, and labelled.

name: Afternoon Thunderstorms
description:
Afternoon Thunderstorms: a stormy gray jelly with small & medium black hexes and a strong red-gold shimmer, reminiscent of lightning strikes or sunlight peeking through rain clouds.

Nail wheel swatches show 1 coat over China Glaze Recycle, 3 coats, 2 coats, 1 coat on it's own.
Nail swatch is 2 coats, courtesy of Chalkboard Nails.
